column5: Our group is thinking about staying at the Eagle Nest Lodge Landing in Manitoba and on the Winnepeg River. Any output on the lodging and fishing would be appreciated. Thanks in advance.
It is a very nice lodge. We stayed at the lodge that is up river. Excellent fishing, good food and very pleasant owners. Don

Try posting this question on a site called walleyewarrior/looney beaver, looneybeaver.com/forum Aaron Wiebe and Rivereye have both guided out of the lodge not the landing. Rcmpbj on that site is also a friend of the owner.
